ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 58
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The idea had crossed my mind once or twice. Never really suggested it to Verant though. It s a good idea, but I d rather see them get the bugs worked out
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Libertn2@...

>I just thought it'd be a neat idea to have 'name tags' on trade-made
> >products. Maybe not for cooking or brewing, as those items aren't >meant
>to last, but on generally anything else. Something in the >status window
>that says, "made by: name". Wouldn't that just be neat?

The idea had crossed my mind once or twice. Never really suggested it to
Verant though. It's a good idea, but I'd rather see them get the bugs worked
out first, and do something about smithing other things like plate, weapons
etc. I'd also like to see them do something about using different ores (IE -
mithril, adamantite etc.) and possibly enchanting magic weapons and armor
(by no means do I think that these should be easy tasks to do in game!)
